movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.plot_summary: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.

movies.title: Sicario
movies.plot_summary: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

movies.title: Enemy
movies.plot_summary: A mild-mannered college professor discovers a look-alike actor and delves into the other man's private affairs.
